excerpt: A creamy & tangy Caesar dressing made without any animal products.

ingredients.name: Cashews
ingredients.notes: Soaked for 2-4 hours in water then drained

instructions.name: Blend the ingredients
instructions: In a blender, combine the soaked cashews, water, garlic, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, capers, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper until smooth and creamy.

instructions.name: Add the olive oil
instructions: With the blender running, slowly pour in the olive oil until completely emulsified.

instructions.name: Taste and adjust seasoning
instructions: Taste the dressing and adjust seasoning as necessary.

instructions.name: Serve
instructions: Use immediately or store in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 5 days.
